name: Databricks Asset Bundle
description: Create Dagster assets from Databricks Asset Bundle YAML configuration files. Each task in the bundle becomes a materializable asset with automatic dependency tracking.
author: Dagster Community

outputs.description: Generates assets for each task in the bundle

databricks_config_path.label: Bundle Config Path
databricks_config_path.description: Path to databricks.yml bundle configuration file (relative to project root)

asset_key_prefix.label: Asset Key Prefix
asset_key_prefix.description: Optional prefix for all asset keys generated from bundle tasks

group_name.label: Asset Group
group_name.description: Group name for all generated assets
